page.title: 18LUNAN AREA, LIFE STYLES.
page.content: The quality of life in this area in 1985 depends a great deal on transport. If you have got your own transport to enable you to shop, go out to places of entertainment and taxi your children to their various activities outwith the Lunan area you have the best of both worlds. The beach, the countryside, the peace; a very good environment, plus urban amenities. If however, you depend on public transport, your social activities, especially for the very old and the very young are greatly curtailed. The teenagers in the area feel no such limitations, they go by bus to the discos in Montrose, travelling back by late bus or getting a lift from parents. The older people appear to enjoy their evenings watching television.
